summary: Project involves updating a draft/design by placing specific photos under named people (e.g., placing photo #1 under 'Dilkhush'; Rohit suit photo already set).
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Replace the Dilkhush square headshot with Photo #1 (founder-dilkhush.dim_512x512.jpg > founder-dilkhush.dim_512x512.jpg)
- Replace the small Dilkhush square headshot with Photo #1 (founder-dilkhush.dim_128x128.jpg > founder-dilkhush.dim_128x128.jpg)

existing_features.title: Update the Dilkhush founder photo so that the image shown under the "Dilkhush" card in the "Meet the Owners" section uses Photo #1 (the photo where he is sitting in a car wearing a black shirt). This update must also reflect anywhere else the app uses the Dilkhush founder image constants (e.g., header avatar and About section).

new_feature_requests.summary: Place photo #1 (car seated, black shirt) under 'Dilkhush' in the draft/version being edited

projectName: Set Dilkhush section to use Photo #1
